sql.query: select app_no, perapp_fname as comapp_companyname, perapp_cbsid as comapp_companyid, org_name, upper(app_status), mail_fromusrid as sname, TO_CHAR(mail_date,'DD/MM/YYYY'), 'AGRI' as comapp_comtype, '' as comapp_ssitype,perapp_id as comapp_id,mail_type,app_valuesin,app_renew_flag,org_scode from appmailbox a, applications, com_demographics, perapplicant, organisations where mail_date =(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where b.mail_appno = a.mail_appno) and mail_tousrid ='^' and mail_appno = app_no and perapp_id=demo_comappnewid and demo_Appno=app_no and demo_apptype='N' and org_code=app_orgcode and app_status in('op','pa','pr') and upper(app_loantype)='^' and APP_LOANSUBTYPE_DIGI in ('PA') and app_delflag='N' and (mail_type='A' or mail_type is null) order by app_status,mail_date desc
